docs.title: FreeSurfer
docs.description:
FreeSurfer is a software package for the analysis and visualization of neuroimaging data from cross-sectional and longitudinal studies. It is developed by the Laboratory for Computational Neuroimaging at the Martinos Center for Biomedical Imaging.

FreeSurfer provides full processing streams for structural and functional MRI and includes tools for linear and nonlinear registration, cortical and subcortical segmentation, cortical surface reconstruction, statistical analysis of group morphometry, diffusion MRI, PET analysis, and much more. It is also the structural MRI analysis software of choice for the Human Connectome Project.

docs.title: Regression coefficients
docs.description: All regression coefficients (B).

docs.title: Residual error file
docs.description: Residual error.

docs.title: Residual variance file
docs.description: Residual error variance.

docs.title: Residual standard deviation
docs.description: Residual error standard deviation.

docs.title: Output FSGD file
docs.description: FSGD file if one was input.

docs.title: Normalized weights file
docs.description: Normalized weights with --w or --wls.

docs.title: Signal estimate file
docs.description: Signal estimate with --save-yhat.

docs.title: Final mask file
docs.description: Final mask when a mask is used.

docs.title: Design matrix condition file
docs.description: Design matrix condition at each voxel with --save-cond.

docs.title: Contrast output directory
docs.description: Directory for each contrast output files.
Performs general linear model (GLM) analysis in the volume or the surface.

docs.title: GLM output directory
docs.description: Directory where output will be saved.

docs.title: Input file
docs.description: Path to input file where each frame is a separate input. Accepts volume or surface-based formats.

docs.title: Stats table
docs.description: Use text table as input instead of --y. Table should be of form produced by asegstats2table or aparcstats2table.

docs.title: FSGD descriptor file
docs.description: Specify the global design matrix with a FreeSurfer Group Descriptor File (FSGDF).

docs.title: Design matrix file
docs.description: Explicitly specify the design matrix. Can be in simple text or in matlab4 format.

docs.title: Contrast matrix file
docs.description: Specify one or more contrasts to test. File should be ASCII text with the contrast matrix.

docs.title: One-sample group mean
docs.description: Construct X and C as a one-sample group mean.

docs.title: No contrasts OK flag
docs.description: Do not fail if no contrasts are specified.

docs.title: DTI parameters
docs.description: Do DTI analysis using bvals and bvecs.

docs.title: DTI design matrix
docs.description: Do DTI analysis using provided matrix.

docs.title: Per-voxel regressors
docs.description: Per-voxel (or vertex) regressors.

docs.title: Self-regressor coordinates
docs.description: Create a 'self-regressor' from the input data based on the waveform at index col row slice.

docs.title: Weighted least squares
docs.description: Perform weighted least squares (WLS) random effects analysis instead of ordinary least squares (OLS) using yffxvar.

docs.title: YFFX variance file
docs.description: For fixed effects analysis.

docs.title: Fixed effects DOF
docs.description: Degrees of Freedom (DOF) for fixed effects analysis.

docs.title: Fixed effects DOF data
docs.description: Text file with DOF for fixed effects analysis.

docs.title: Weight file
docs.description: Perform weighted LMS using per-voxel weights from the weightfile.

docs.title: Invert weights flag
docs.description: Invert weights.

docs.title: Square root weights flag
docs.description: Square root of (inverted) weights.

docs.title: Smoothing kernel FWHM
docs.description: Smooth input with a Gaussian kernel, specified in mm.

docs.title: Variance smoothing FWHM
docs.description: Smooth residual variance map with a Gaussian kernel, specified in mm.

docs.title: Skip mask during smoothing
docs.description: Do not mask when smoothing.

docs.title: No FWHM estimation
docs.description: Turn off FWHM output estimation.

docs.title: Mask file
docs.description: Binary mask file for analysis.

docs.title: Label file
docs.description: Use label as mask for surface data.

docs.title: No mask flag
docs.description: Do NOT use a mask, same as --no-cortex.

docs.title: No cortex label flag
docs.description: Do NOT use subjects ?h.cortex.label as --label.

docs.title: Invert mask flag
docs.description: Invert mask for analysis.

docs.title: Prune zero-value voxels
docs.description: Remove voxels that do not have a non-zero value at each frame.

docs.title: Do not prune voxels
docs.description: Do not prune zero-value voxels.

docs.title: Log transform y
docs.description: Compute natural log of y prior to analysis.

docs.title: No log transform of y
docs.description: Do not compute natural log of y prior to analysis.

docs.title: Remove spatial mean
docs.description: Subtract the (masked) mean from each frame.

docs.title: Save signal estimate
docs.description: Save signal estimate (yhat).

docs.title: Save residual error
docs.description: Save residual error (eres).

docs.title: Save residual SCM
docs.description: Save residual error spatial correlation matrix (eres.scm).

docs.title: Save FWHM map
docs.description: Save voxel-wise map of FWHM estimates.

docs.title: Output pre-processed data file
docs.description: Save input after any pre-processing.

docs.title: Surface specification
docs.description: Specify that the input has a surface geometry from the hemisphere of the given FreeSurfer subject. Required for surface data operations.

docs.title: Compute skewness
docs.description: Compute skew and p-value for skew.

docs.title: Compute kurtosis
docs.description: Compute kurtosis and p-value for kurtosis.

docs.title: Simulation parameters
docs.description: Simulate data for statistical testing. Specify nulltype, number of simulations, threshold and csd basename.

docs.title: Simulation sign
docs.description: Specify sign for simulation: abs, pos, or neg.

docs.title: Uniform distribution parameters
docs.description: Use uniform distribution for mc-full, specify min and max.

docs.title: Permute input flag
docs.description: Permute input for testing purposes (not related to simulation).

docs.title: Perform PCA
docs.description: Perform PCA/SVD analysis on the residual.

docs.title: Compute temporal AR1
docs.description: Compute and save temporal AR1 of residual.

docs.title: Save signal estimate flag
docs.description: Flag to save the signal estimate.

docs.title: Save condition number
docs.description: Flag to save design matrix condition at each voxel.

docs.title: Voxel dump coordinates
docs.description: Save GLM data for a single voxel at the specified col, row, slice.

docs.title: Random seed
docs.description: Use seed for random number generation.

docs.title: Synthesize Gaussian noise
docs.description: Replace input data with Gaussian noise for testing.

docs.title: Resynthesis test iterations
docs.description: Test GLM by resynthsis with the number of iterations specified.

docs.title: Profile iterations
docs.description: Test speed with specified number of iterations.

docs.title: MRTM1 parameters
docs.description: Perform MRTM1 kinetic modeling with specified reference tissue activity and time in seconds.

docs.title: MRTM2 parameters
docs.description: Perform MRTM2 kinetic modeling with specified parameters.

docs.title: Logan model parameters
docs.description: Perform Logan kinetic modeling with specified parameters.

docs.title: Clip negative BP
docs.description: Set negative BP voxels to 0.

docs.title: Max value for BP clipping
docs.description: Set BP voxels above max to max.

docs.title: Force permutation test
docs.description: Force permutation test, even when design matrix is not orthogonal.

docs.title: Diagnostic level
docs.description: Set diagnostic level.

docs.title: Cluster diagnostic
docs.description: Save significant volume and exit from first simulation loop.

docs.title: Debug mode
docs.description: Turn on debugging mode.

docs.title: Check options only
docs.description: Check options and exit without executing.

docs.title: Help
docs.description: Display help information.

docs.title: Version
docs.description: Print out version and exit.

docs.title: No fix vertex area
docs.description: Turn off fixing of vertex area (backward compatibility).

docs.title: Allow subject repetition
docs.description: Allow subject names to repeat in the fsgd file.

docs.title: Allow zero DOF
docs.description: Allow analyses with zero degrees of freedom.

docs.title: Allow ill-condition
docs.description: Allow ill-conditioned design matrices.

docs.title: Simulation done file
docs.description: Create done file when simulation finishes.

docs.title: No double precision
docs.description: Compute sig = -log10(p) from float p value, not double.
Performs general linear model (GLM) analysis in the volume or the surface.
